text: Until @HHSGov states “why” successful clinical studies on using #HydroxyChloroquine/#Chloroquine against #SARS (SARS-CoV-1) were removed from the @NLM_NIH trials database right after Trump mentioned using it, I will look at everything they say with suspicion. @OIGatHHS https://t.co/0lX0px2iut
